title: Textile, 1925–40
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: Foundation: 1+4 satin (weft float face).  Printed and dyed according to the Fortuny process, which in this case included a discharging or bleaching agent that was screen-printed.
dimensions:
H x W: 141.9 x 66 cm (55 7/8 in. x 26 in.)
Repeat H: 94 cm (37 in.)
description: Vertically symmetrical design of scrolls and leaves in gray and blue on red.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1925–40.Medium: cotton
Technique: Foundation: 1+4 satin (weft float face).  Printed and dyed according to the Fortuny process, which in this case included a discharging or bleaching agent that was screen-printed.. Gift of Mrs. Germaine Little. 1968-110-174.
